name: Ceggtcher VR
description: Want to test your dexterity? Do you think that you have a fast lightning reaction? A huge number of falling eggs, great atmosphere and a lot of fun are waiting for you! Check yourself! Catch as many eggs as you can!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows® 7 SP1, Windows® 8.1 or later, Windows® 10 Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-4590/AMD FX™ 8350 equivalent or better Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 970, AMD Radeon™ R9 290 equivalent or better Storage: 440 MB available space Additional Notes: We strongly recommends that your Power Plan under Windows Power Options be set to "High performance" or equivalent
